description: Creates or updates a new storage account. This operation requires the storage/set permission.

storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account.

autoregeneratekey.description: whether keyvault should manage the storage account for the user.

activekeyname.description: Current active storage account key name.

parameters.description: The parameters to create a storage account.

regenerationperiod.description: The key regeneration time duration specified in ISO-8601 format.

attributes.description: The attributes of the storage account.

tags.description: Application specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.
